forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
